professionalSummary.text: Backend Developer with 4+ years of experience building secure and scalable applications using PHP (Laravel). Skilled in RESTful API design, MySQL/MongoDB query optimization, and proficient in Node.js with working knowledge of React.js & Next.js. Strong focus on clean architecture, performance optimization, and modern development practices with growing full-stack expertise.

experience.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Developed a CRM module from scratch, including lead management, real-time client–agent communication, and integration with WhatsApp, Facebook (Meta) APIs, and Pusher for instant notifications.
Built a Stock Management System from scratch, covering Normal & Lot-wise inventory, low stock and expiry alerts, plus stock movement operations (In, Out, Transfer).
Collaborated in an Agile environment with Jira for sprint tracking and Git for version control, ensuring scalable and maintainable solutions.

experience.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Worked on an email marketing automation tool, contributing to both backend (Laravel) and frontend (Next.js) development in a collaborative team environment.
Engineered a custom SQL query builder to execute core database queries without Eloquent, significantly improving performance and response times.
Built and maintained RESTful APIs to ensure smooth data exchange between frontend and backend components.
Integrated APIs on the frontend and used Git for version control to manage and track development tasks effectively.

experience.title: Mid-Level Software Engineer
achievements: Developed and maintained backend systems using PHP (Laravel), including custom CMS solutions, e-commerce platforms, and admin panels from backend to deployment.
Integrated third-party APIs and payment gateways, and used Blade templating to build responsive, dynamic interfaces with a focus on performance and usability.

experience.title: PHP Developer
achievements: Collaborated with team members to complete assigned tasks and converted static HTML templates into responsive, cross-browser-compatible WordPress themes with clean code structure.

projects.title: Laravel API CRUD Generator
projects.description: Published a Composer package on Packagist to automate CRUD API generation using Artisan commands, streamlining route, controller, and model creation with validation. Reused across projects to reduce repetitive code and accelerate development.

projects.title: Email Marketing System
projects.description: Developed an email marketing platform with multi-server support for improved deliverability and load distribution. Implemented smart scheduling, audience segmentation, bounce tracking, and real-time server monitoring for high-volume, efficient email delivery.

projects.title: Dentalzorg ERP
projects.description: Independently developed a dental CRM module from scratch as part of a regional ERP system, enabling clinics to manage patients, appointments, and treatments, with role-based access and automated reminders.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering (BSSE)
Diploma of Associate Engineer in Mechanical Engineering (MT)

certifications.title: Node.js Backend Development
certifications.description: Advanced Node.js programming and backend development certification

contact.formDescription: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
